articles.title: The forging of a Black Captain America by battling supremacy in "Falcon and the Winter Soldier" - Salon
articles.description: To take up Cap's shield in a country built on white supremacy requires more than a stellar workout montage
articles.content:

articles.title: Researchers now have an estimate for just how many T. rex once roamed Earth - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Billions of Tyrannosaurus rex roamed North America during their fascinating reign as top predators, according to a team of researchers that went about the daunting task of making the calculation.
